briefdescription.para: Weak reference to the crosshair widget for UI updates.
Weak reference to the hitmarker widget for UI updates.
Data asset defining weapon parameters: damage, fire rate, spread, etc.
Seconds after stopping fire before recoil pattern resets.
Speed at which recoil recovers (higher = faster).
Interpolation speed for visual recoil easing.
Degrees/sec strength to recover back to initial aim.
Duration of the field-of-view punch effect (seconds).
Exponent for easing the FOV punch (higher = snappier start).
Current ammo loaded in the magazine.
Current reserve ammo count.
True while a reload sequence is in progress.
Timer for handling auto-fire ticks.
Timer to delay recoil pattern reset.
Timer to manage reload duration.
Player is holding fire input.
A shot was just fired (for cooldown)
Automatic fire is currently active.
Ensures one shot per button press in semi-auto.
Timestamp of last shot for rate control.
Delay after shot before next allowed.
Desired spread angle this frame.
Active spread angle used for fire & UI.
Current FOV punch offset.
Elapsed time of active FOV punch.
True while FOV punch effect is running.
Index into the weapon's spray pattern.
Cached pointer to the owning character.
Stores per-weapon ammo data so we can swap assets and restore counts.
Cached reference to the in-game HUD widget.
Constructor that sets default values for this component's properties.
Fire a single shot or sub-shot.

parameterdescription.para: Index to support multi-projectile weapons (e.g. shotgun pellets).
Used for replicated fire timing; defaults to local time.

briefdescription.para: Reset the recoil pattern to its starting index.
Begin continuous fire (for automatic weapons).
Cease continuous fire.
Called on each tick to handle automatic fire logic when StartFiring() has been invoked.
Reload the weapon's clip if reserve ammo is available.
Finalize the reload, updating clip and reserve ammo counts.
Retrieve the current pixel offset used by the crosshair.
Assign the main HUD widget once the player controller has initialized it.

parameterdescription.para: Reference to the player's HUD widget.

briefdescription.para: Provide the crosshair widget for dynamic spread updates.
Provide the hitmarker widget to display impacts.
Returns the current spread value (degrees) for UI or recoil logic.
Query the current ammo counts.

parameterdescription.para: Receives the number of rounds in the clip.
Receives the number of rounds in reserve.

briefdescription.para: Switch to a different weapon data asset at runtime.

detaileddescription.para:
Preserves and restores ammo counts per asset via FWeaponAmmoData.
NewWeaponData
The new weapon configuration asset.

briefdescription.para: Called when the game starts; initializes ammo and HUD references.
Per-frame update.

detaileddescription.para: Handles firing cooldowns, recoil recovery, and updates to the crosshair via UpdateCrosshairSpread().

briefdescription.para: Called once the component is registered; ensures any Blueprint wiring occurs.
Checks whether the weapon can currently fire.

detaileddescription.para:
Prevents firing if no ammo, currently reloading, or cooldown still active.
True if all firing conditions are met.

briefdescription.para: Adjusts the player's crosshair spread based on movement, firing, and reload state.
Component responsible for all weapon behavior: firing, reloading, recoil, and UI updates.

detaileddescription.para:
This component exposes:
FireWeapon() for triggering shots (supports sub-shots via the SubShotIndex parameter).
ReloadWeapon() and FinishReloading() for handling ammo refill.
UpdateCrosshairSpread() for driving the HUD crosshair based on movement and weapon state.
